oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pescarol, Moshe ben Avraham
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bible. O.T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Illuminated scroll, earliest known example of an Italian illustrated Magillah. This section shows three panels, the first shows six people including a seated Queen and a man in black. The second shows three standing men one of whom is holding out a cape. The third panel shows four people including two Royals.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Detail of Esther scroll
